    • Class gui.JUnoFrame

      class JUnoFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      481508119037659069L

      • Serialized Fields

        • accountCard
          AccountCard accountCard
          an object that extends JPanel representing the account selection screen of the game
        • backButton
          JButton backButton
          a button that takes the user back to the account selection screen
        • backgroungPlay
          PanelGradient backgroungPlay
          an object that extends JPanel representing the background of the game screen
        • bottomCardPanel
          PlayerPanel bottomCardPanel
          a panel containing the bottom player's hand card and his name
        • bottomPlayerPanel
          JPanel bottomPlayerPanel
          a panel representing the bottom player in the game with UNO button
        • controller
          Controller controller
          an object that controls the game's logic and data
        • deckPanel
          DeckPanel deckPanel
          a panel representing the game's draw, discard piles and game direction
        • homeCard
          HomeCard homeCard
          an object that extends JPanel representing the home screen of the game
        • leftPlayerPanel
          PlayerPanel leftPlayerPanel
          a panel containing the left player's hand card and his name
        • lock
          Object lock
          An object used to synchronize access to resources.
        • pauseButton
          JButton pauseButton
          a button that toggles the paused state of the game
        • pausePanel
          JPanel pausePanel
          a panel containing the pause and back buttons.
        • pauseResume
          ActionListener pauseResume
          Action listener to pause and resume the game. When the pause button is clicked, the game is paused or resumed. The image on the button is also changed to reflect the current state of the game (paused or not paused). When the game is paused, the lock object is notified to unblock any threads that may be waiting on it.
        • playerList
          List<PlayerPanel> playerList
          a list of all player panels in the game
        • playPan
          JPanel playPan
          a panel containing the game elements (e.g. deck, players)
        • rightPlayerPanel
          PlayerPanel rightPlayerPanel
          a panel containing the right player's hand card and his name
        • topCardPanel
          PlayerPanel topCardPanel
          a panel containing the top player's hand card and his name
        • topPlayerPanel
          JPanel topPlayerPanel
          a panel representing the top player in the game
        • unoButton
          JButton unoButton
          a button that allows the player to declare UNO

    • Class gui.PlayerPanel

      class PlayerPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • arcs
          Dimension arcs
          Double values for Horizontal and Vertical radius of corner arcs
        • controller
          Controller controller
          The controller for the game of UNO.
        • frame
          JUnoFrame frame
          The frame that contains the PlayerPanel.
        • highQuality
          boolean highQuality
          Sets if it has an High Quality view
        • innerBorder
          TitledBorder innerBorder
          The inner border that displays the player's alias.
        • myCardLayout
          FlowLayout myCardLayout
          The layout manager for the panel.
        • outerBorder
          Border outerBorder
          The outer border for the panel.
        • player
          Player player
          The player whose information is displayed in the panel.
        • shadowAlpha
          int shadowAlpha
          The transparency value of shadow. ( 0 - 255)
        • shadowColor
          Color shadowColor
          Color of shadow
        • shadowOffset
          int shadowOffset
          The offset of shadow.
        • shady
          boolean shady
          Sets if it drops shadow
        • strokeSize
          int strokeSize
          Stroke size. it is recommended to set it to 1 for better view

  • Package model

    • Class model.Account

      class Account extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      -7593324165697695593L

      • Serialized Fields

        • accountIcon
          ImageIcon accountIcon
          ImageIcon to identify the account icon (not implemented yet)
        • alias
          String alias
          string to identify the account name
        • gamesPlayed
          int gamesPlayed
          integer to identify games played by an account
        • gamesWon
          int gamesWon
          integer to identify games won by an account
        • id
          int id
          integer to identify a unique account
        • level
          double level
          decimal value to identify the account level (based on number of gamesPlayed and gamesWon)

      serialVersionUID:
      1417022577116187699L

      • Serialized Fields
